caption.p: Flow cytometry analysis of the expression of CD83 and CD86 markers. LPS-stimulated DCs in combination with different inducers were evaluated for the expression of CD83 and CD86 markers

table-wrap-foot.p: Data presented as mean percentages of markers expression obtained from three different individuals ± SD. Note: (*) Referred to significant difference when compared to LPS-stimulated DCs only, where *** P < 0.001
